metadata.title: Apple iOS 27 to Be No-Frills ‘Snow Leopard’ Update, Other Than New AI
metadata.description: Apple’s next major iPhone software update — iOS 27 — will have two major elements: quality improvements and artificial intelligence features. Also: The report on Tim Cook’s imminent departure as CEO is premature, and OpenAI continues poaching Apple engineers. Lastly, the iPhone Air designer who introduced the device has left the company.
